venue.address_1: Corner of Rt 66 and Harvestwood Rd.
venue.name: Eckankar Temple of Connecticut

item.description:
Are you interested in exploring your health from a spiritual vantage point? In this workshop you'll learn spiritual exercises to help you see yourself and your state of health from a higher perspective than you've likely ever imagined.

Workshop runs from 12:30PM to 2:30PM, Sunday, September 9th.

Facilitated by Sue Keck and Jamie Fairley. Sponsored by the Eckankar Center of Middlefield. Suggested donation $7.00.

Â
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be downstairs in the large classroom

group.name: The Central Connecticut Spiritual Experiences Group

item.name: Workshop on Spiritual Wisdom on Health and Healing
